title: The following is a content layout
text: Each section below has a message and graphics exactly like https://one.ai/.  You're okaying these before fleshing them out more.  Edit anything.  They are interchangeable.
variant: These descriptions are for the graphics that go into each section.  Section dimensions and the # of sections are flexible.

title: 1. We express the problem here.
text: Describe energy grid challenges now and in the future.  Graphics too.
variant: Various power generation, transmission and storage systems, large costs and unknowns.

title: 2. Describe our solution
text: How we provide resources for scientists and organizations to develop energy solutions.  Graphics too.
variant: Integrated knowledge and expertise from a wide range of scientific disciplines, including electrical engineering, physics, materials science, and computer science, to effectively design and implement a complex and advanced energy grid.

title: 3. How your participation is key
text: You can immediately join and get the benefits listed.
variant: Scientists using tools to collaborate and share. Scientists platformed and popular vs. unknown

title: 4. The benefits of our solution
text: How OPEN supports any country's endeavor to develop a sustainable energy grid.
variant: Countries being powered by scientists contributions. Balanced competing interests and priorities among stakeholders, including government agencies, utilities, and private sector companies.

title: 7. Calls to action and resources
text: Everything that is here in the site available to you now.
